pageContext.claim: “I've never seen him cry, but when he wants to get on camera, he cries so much. Crying Chuck, I call him, you know, because he feels so sad, he feels so sorry for people. Uh, don't worry about it, he doesn't, but crying Chuck. And you understand what I mean, crying Chuck, what a beauty, rotten looks like the -- because -- not a good guy.”
pageContext.analysis: Oddly enough, Trump has seen Schumer cry when the senator choked back tears over the president’s 2017 ban on refugees and individuals from certain Muslim-majority nations from entering the U.S. At the time, Trump claimed the tears were fake.
